name: Woo Product Multi Layout lite
author: eDataStyle

sections.description:
Woo Product Multi Layout Demo.

More amazing features available in Pro version.

Sample Video

Woo Product Multi Layout plugins recently grab attentions from many website builders. They realize the plugin to diversify the approach they show product items fantastically and differently. and also the WooCommerce products layout is crafted with this main goal. If you’ve got the problem concerning to product item show of WooCommerce plugin which may display as needed. plug in show Product for woocommerce with shortcode will be associate auxiliary equipment that provides you’ll control product display in everywhere and every form as your want.

All things are editable like product background color, product hover after background color, product hover after font color, button hover color, category & title color, short content status, category status, SKU status etc…

Features of this plugin

  • Easily Installation , Easily configure, User-friendly, Easily customize styles
  • 600+ Google fonts include …
  • Work with Visual Composer
  • Work with default WooCommerce shop page , category page , tag page , search page.
  • Multiple filter products (All Product, Only Featured Products, Only Sale Products, In Stock Product, Out of Stock Product )
  • Multiple select products, exclude products, categories, exclude categories,tag and attributes…
  • Layout Settins Choose between 6 build-in Template ( Grid ,List, Table , Carusel, List & Grid Mix , Odd Even grid )
  • Easy to create new addon for layout using ( Hook ,filter and action )
  • You can easy Change Color, fonts, font size , background for any element .
  • Support pagination in Grid style
  • it support Responsive ready
  • Display in every where reburied search as page , page or widgets
  • Much more…

This plugin will be a great solution for the template without supporting the display of WooCommerce. By this way, you can customize what you love to display when hovering on product items.

More amazing features available in Pro version.

Important Notes

If you are looking for more options then check out the pro version of the plugin.

For Quick support please check WP
Responsive menu Support forum.
sections.installation:
Install Unlimited Background Slider just like any other WordPress plugin.
[Installing Plugins] (https://codex.wordpress.org/Managing_Plugins)

Usage

short_description: A simple user interface for Display WooCommerce Product shortcode . grid, list, table, list and box, mationary, Carousel Layout layouts
